overview: THE WRESTLERS: TOM KATT VS. STEVE MARKS  BG originally created the series, Fantasy Fights, to feature leading porn stars of the day in wrestling scenarios. It was important that at least one of the two would know how to wrestle, how to apply holds. If the other also knew how to wrestle it would be a bonus for the match. If he didn't, then it would be a squash job. That was the "fight" part. The Fantasy part was seeing your favorite porn stars in a wrestling scenario, something not usually shown in the world of adult video. For Steve Marks, a porn star who didn't know how to wrestle, he was engaging in a long held personal "Fantasy" of his own; getting it on with a huge porn and physique star, Tom Katt. For Tom this matchup was a way to let out all his aggressions on a very muscular "pretty boy".
title: Fantasy Fight 4
